html: For the foundations of Kir-hareseth "For the men of Kirhares"— A palpable mistake in this place is happily corrected by the parallel text of Jeremiah 48:31 , where, instead of אשישי ashishey , foundations or flagons, we read אנשי anshey , men. In the same place of Jeremiah, and in Jeremiah 48:36 , and here in Isaiah 16:11 , the name of the city is Kirhares, not Kirhareseth.
